attributes.action: stop trying to price drivers of the road, while rail and bus companies are trying to price users off of their services to reduce congestion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the recently introduced increase in rail fairs after 9am and before 12pm to reduce overcrowding on the trains, it seems ludicrous that road charging and fuel duty are pricing people off the roads with no viable alternative.  As the majority of the general public have little choice over the time at which they need to be at work it is currently unavoidable that there is a busy period which cannot be solved by simply increasing prices.  Give the hard working public a break!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
